participant_1.name: Lila Green
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and environmentally conscious, with a passion for nature and gardening.
participant_1.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i'm a feminist. i have solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet.

participant_2.name: Mark Johnson
participant_2.personality: friendly and easy-going, with a humorous perspective on life.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i'm employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. my father drove a car for nascar. i've a german shepherd named barnaby.
